definition: Target size in quoted asset is used to define the size of the position, denominating it in the quoted asset.

paragraphs.text: If you prefer to define the size of the position denominated in the quoted asset, then use this node and delete the target size in base asset node.
Make sure you read the definition of the target size in base asset node to get the proper context for this definition.
Adding a Target Size In Quoted Asset
To add the target size in quoted asset node, select Add Missing Items on the parent node menu.
